about_the_game:
Yez- The Dark Amulet, is a First Person RPG, similar to Old School Dungeon Crawlers, except it has more of an open world type mixed with dungeons. It involves sword play, magic, and skills. You can pick between 3 classes in the beginning Warrior, Mage, or Thief. And choose male or female.
And there are many items and pieces of loot that drop randomly off of enemies. Choose which quests to start with and which path to choose after the initial intro. There are many paths, and many places to openly explore as you wish. But it's best and wise to follow any of the job boards first, which are all over town in Yetzwood. The game has Survival elements, you need to eat, drink, and sleep. And you can also pick plants up off the ground, which you will need for extra MP and HP to heal in the beginning. If you choose to follow the Blacksmith's questline you will discover many new swords, and receive swords in your base which you can switch between on the fly. For cosmetic purposes. But every time you find a new sword you gain power to your sword fighting. So be sure to see the Blacksmith Bjorn. It's a fantasy based medieval game.

content_descriptors.notes:
Cartoon pixelated violence without gore, skeletons, zombies,
Sword swinging, Killing without blood.

detailed_description:
Yez- The Dark Amulet, is a First Person RPG, similar to Old School Dungeon Crawlers, except it has more of an open world type mixed with dungeons. It involves sword play, magic, and skills. You can pick between 3 classes in the beginning Warrior, Mage, or Thief. And choose male or female.
And there are many items and pieces of loot that drop randomly off of enemies. Choose which quests to start with and which path to choose after the initial intro. There are many paths, and many places to openly explore as you wish. But it's best and wise to follow any of the job boards first, which are all over town in Yetzwood. The game has Survival elements, you need to eat, drink, and sleep. And you can also pick plants up off the ground, which you will need for extra MP and HP to heal in the beginning. If you choose to follow the Blacksmith's questline you will discover many new swords, and receive swords in your base which you can switch between on the fly. For cosmetic purposes. But every time you find a new sword you gain power to your sword fighting. So be sure to see the Blacksmith Bjorn. It's a fantasy based medieval game.
name: Yez- The Dark Amulet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASUS Xonar SE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASUS Xonar SE
  • VR Support: not needed

short_description: Yez has been infected with an element called Startite It spread through the land and twisted it's creatures into the Shadow Beings. The Creator sent down a Universal Guardian to deal the Shadow Beings. But after thousands of years of peace. The Shadow Beings have returned. Now it's all up to you.
